archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0585
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As the owner of a service, I want to be able to easily receive and approve or deny change requests from my administrator that doesn't have permission to make changes without approval, so that I can stay in control of my services

properties.value: Same as above? Could you provide an example? Parked for customer hierarchy workshop

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
